name: places/ChIJo63JkPz1wokRidQPCPokF3A
formattedAddress: 517 E 117th St, New York, NY 10035, USA
adrFormatAddress: 517 E 117th St, New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text: I never saw the optometrist here so I cannot speak for that. I brought my prescription to this location to buy some glasses. The staff members here are always pleasant. Everyone here is so knowledgeable and helpful. The selection of frames is great and they always have something beautiful for an unbeatable price. After one great experience my whole family switched to buying their specs from here. My mother had a pair made and two weeks later the nose pads started to hurt. Those were replaced to better softer ones in no time, no questions asked. Orders received promptly with no issues.

originalText.text: Tried to get contacts from this place and still haven't gotten them in 3 months. The second set of trials I got is worse than the first to the point I can't read street signs. They said it would take 10 days for the 3rd set of trials and even after 2 weeks it still didn't ship in. I needed contacts for a trip I'm going on and now I'm screwed. They are also understaffed and it is hard to get them on the phone. Didn't even end up saving money because I'm moving so I will have to end up going to another optometrist in another state and this was all for nothing.

originalText.text: Excellent customer service from staff. Very friendly. Obstetrician was also friendly and patient accommodating to all my questions and concerns. I felt he did an excellent job in working to fine tune my previous prescription from another doctor that could've done a better job. I'm quite satisfied now with my new prescriptions and their service! Plus their prices are very reasonable and affordable. Thats something else to note, the staff doesn't try to push or upsell you in any way. They're very friendly and all about the customers satisfaction than trying to be pushy salesmen. Good customer service is becoming hard to come by these days. These guys deserve all five stars! I got my prescriptions in less than a week.

originalText.text: Dr was late to appointment by 20 minutes, didn't even apologize just sped through the appointment and moved on. They got my name wrong on my prescription and have still yet to give me a corrected prescription.

originalText.text: Very poor experience with this locations Optical department. This location arbitrarily charges an extra $25 to teach you how to correctly use contact lenses. No other location in the area charges this fee. They would not let's is decline (we already know how to use contact lenses). The staff, both the Optometrist and receptionist, we're rude and couldn't explain why they would need to force this charge.
